the main reason I see why most foot care products are minty is because the menthol in the product is cooling on the feet, which is an extra layer of relief for those who are on their feet all day. Upshot (or downshot) of that is that one's feet smell like toothpaste. :P
the use of menthol/mint is to get rid of stinky feet but also to increase circulation to your feet which helps to keep them soft and smooth!
